title: kaNDe kaNDe kaNDe
sahitya:
kaNDe kaNDe kaNDe namma kangaLa dhEnuva kaNDe
mangaLa mUruti mannAra krSNna kaNDe kaNDe kaNDe


caraNam 1    uTTa pItAmbara toTTa vajrAngiya puTTa pAdada ranna mannAra krSNana
    caraNam 2    oraLaneLevana beraLa cIpuvana dhareyoLu mereyuva mannAra krSNana
    caraNam 3    karada kankaNa beraLa mudrike taraLa uDupiya mannAra krSNana
    caraNam 4    alava bodharige olidu banda maha celuva smarana pita mannAra krSNana
    caraNam 5    shESa shayanana bhAsura rUpana shrIsha purandara viTTalarAyana
